NCAA March Madness 98[edit]
NCAA March Madness 98
Developer(s)	Electronic Arts
Publisher(s)	EA Sports
Platform(s)	PlayStation
Release date(s)	
NA February 28, 1998
Genre(s)	Sports, Basketball
Mode(s)	Single-player, multiplayer
NCAA March Madness 98 was the 1998 installment in the NCAA March Madness series. It was released on February 28, 1998 for the PlayStation.[2] Former Wake Forest player and current San Antonio Spurs player Tim Duncan is featured on the cover.
